data.选项B: B. 小明挑出橡皮泥交给王俊

data.选项D: D. 小明从三个玩具中随机拿一个玩具递给王俊
data.STORY: On a Saturday afternoon, Wang Jun, Li Li, and Xiao Ming play toys together at home. They first play with the first novel toy - a remote control airplane, then they play with the second novel toy - play dough together. At this time, Wang Jun says, "I have something to do and need to leave the room", and he leaves after closing the door. Li Li says, "Oh, he leaves, it's okay, we play together." Li Li and Xiao Ming play with the third novel toy - a doodle board. After playing, they put all three toys in a plate on the table. At this time, Wang Jun comes back, looks at the three toys in the tray, and excitedly says, "Oh, look! Look at that toy!", "Xiao Ming, can you pass it to me?"
data.QUESTION: What does Xiao Ming most likely do?
data.OPTION-A: Xiao Ming picks out the remote control airplane and gives it to Wang Jun
data.OPTION-B: Xiao Ming picks out the play dough and gives it to Wang Jun
data.OPTION-C: Xiao Ming picks out the doodle board and gives it to Wang Jun
